name: Penguin Jamboree
description:
Penguin JAMboree

Hello! This is the first game I've ever made after playing with Godot for about 3 weeks. Any feedback welcome and thanks for playing!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Boost - Spacebar

How to Play

Collect as many full jars of jam as you can before time runs out. 

Bonus points for full jars, but partial credit for less. :)

Credits

Level Art: https://craftpix.net/product/snow-2d-game-tileset-pixel-art/

Sounds: http://opengameart.org

Sprites: http://opengameart.org

Banner Art: http://twitch.tv/thefoxandpenguinshow
